description.narrative: Support to the Child Protection component, which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Child Protection â€“ General, Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Evaluation, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 6: By the end of 2022, women, children and adolescents, especially the most vulnerable, make greater use of quality public protection services (civil registration service, juvenile justice and social assistance).

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Support to the Child Protection component

description.narrative: In 2021, the child protection team was strengthened, which has helped boost results for children. At the zonal level, the recruitment process initiated in 2020 for Bol, which covers the crisis in the Lac Province with all its humanitarian challenges, has not yet been completed. Nevertheless, the team has ensured the protection response for children, both in the crisis contexts and in the rest of the country, including for the new influx of Cameroonian refugees.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:02/02/2022
